messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] "3 yo phase"
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/7/00 11:32:29 PM Central Daylight Time, Naykki2@aol.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/7/00 11:32:29 PM Central Daylight Time, Naykki2@...
writes:

<< Although it doesn't often *occur* to him to clean
things up (especially his room), he's quite helpful when asked. So the 3 yo
stage won't last forever <g>.

>>
Hi Laura-- I'm so glad this phase won't last forever... I do have a child who
is older t than my 3 yo. He will be 6 in Sept, and is a little bit better
about helping to clean...but not a whole lot. He is more or less
inconsistent attitude-wise when it comes time to clean. Maybe he's crossing
out of one phase into another. :) Sounds like your son did a great job
taking care of his mess in the kitchen! I look forward to that! :) ~Karen
